org.forgerock.openidm.provisioner.openicf.impl

Class ConnectorInfoProviderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.provisioner.openicf.impl.ConnectorInfoProviderService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.openidm.metadata.MetaDataProvider, org.forgerock.openidm.provisioner.ConfigurationService, ConnectorInfoProvider

    @Service
@Properties(value={@Property(name="service.vendor",value="ForgeRock AS."),@Property(name="service.description",value="OpenICF Connector Info Service")})
@References(value=@Reference(name="osgiConnectorEventPublisher",referenceInterface=org.identityconnectors.common.event.ConnectorEventPublisher.class,bind="bindConnectorEventPublisher",unbind="unbindConnectorEventPublisher",cardinality=OPTIONAL_MULTIPLE,policy=DYNAMIC))
public class ConnectorInfoProviderService
extends Object
implements ConnectorInfoProvider, org.forgerock.openidm.metadata.MetaDataProvider, org.forgerock.openidm.provisioner.ConfigurationService
    The ConnectorInfoProviderService initiates the the embedded OpenICF and makes it available as a service.
